page.title: 10LANDUSE
page.content: In these squares the land is used for many different things.Most of the land is kept grassland or moorland. Much of the remaining land is taken up by farms,and grazing land for animals,but there is a small amount of crop farming in the area.For instance,crops like potatoes and corn are grown. In some of the squares there are rivers,like the River Wye,and the River Derwent.Also on the land there are woods and forests,they are deciduous but there are some conifers. Man has made maximum use of the land,there are six disused quarries and one used quarry.The only remaining quarry produces sandstone,used for much of the areas buildings.
